s.text: First, on the question of Bill Gates, it strikes me as completely unarguable that his "living icon" status has been a tremendous asset to Microsoft--or at least it did until the antitrust trial began.
Sorry to get such a late start today.
I always feel as though I'm starting way too late, and I'll never be able to pull it off, and that this will be the story that finally exposes me for the fraud that I really am.
